title: Why cant I change my name :c
body:
I just wanna change my name to 「ＷＥＥＢＴＲＡＳＨ」 what the world needs it to be, as a yasuo main, and league wont lemme >:c Some1 help or explain why? 
--I know I don't have enough ip, but first win of the day+botgame--
--edit it says 3-16 characters only but uhhh--

replies.body: It's probably not letting you use that name because of the 」 characters. Check out the [**Summoner Name Special Characters**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814#h1q5) that are allowed for your region!
